concept.title: Late Directory
concept.shortdesc: You can configure Directory to read files in a late directory - a directory that appears after the pipeline starts.

conbody.p: Directory originlate directorylate directoryDirectory originWhen reading from a late directory, the origin does not validate the directory path when you start the pipeline. If the directory does not exist when the pipeline starts, the origin waits indefinitely for the appearance of the directory and a file to process.

The directory does not exist when you start the pipeline, so Directory waits until the directory and a file matching the file name pattern appears, and then processes the data.
